name: Treco
description:
You received a strange suitcase belonging to an N. Rojas, use the items in the suitcase and travel trough South America to find and possibly deliver the suitcase to its destination. A game made for the No Shit Sherlock Jam.

Controls: Click on the top lid of the suitcase to close it and open the map. Click the down arrow, the right arrow, the space bar or enter to pass to the next bit of text.
